name: pay_slip
query:
select
    emp_id as "EMP ID",
    emp_name as "NAME",
    emp_role as "ROLE",
    basic_pay as "Basic Pay:Currency",
    da as "Daily Allowence - 100/day",
    absent_days as "Absent Days",
    datediff(last_date, start_date)-absent_days as "Total Present Days",
    (da*100)+(basic_pay-absent_days*300)-((basic_pay*8.5)/100) as "Final Pay:Currency:150"
    
FROM
    `tabemployee_payroll`
where start_date = %(start)s
      and last_date < %(end)s;
